maintainer.name: Christian Birchinger
maintainer.description: Please take over if you want it

pkgmetadata.longdescription: CCZE is my C port of RASZi's colorize, with a set of bug fixes and enhancements. It uses PCRE to do the matching, and NCurses for the output. The goal was to create a log coloriser, that is fast and light on resources. Also, being extensible via plug-ins is an important feature too.
